      • ParticleEffect

        protected ParticleEffect(java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService scheduler,
                         java.lang.Runnable runnable,
                         int initialDelay,
                         int period,
                         java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
        Used to create a new particle effect
        Parameters:
        scheduler - Scheduler for Timing (See Scheduler)
        runnable - Code which gets executed on particle update
        initialDelay - Start animation after x millis
        period - Run code every x millis
        unit - Unit of time (Milliseconds recommended)
